{"id":"JT-47149","entityId":"25-1983309","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"JT"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"47149"},{"name":"summary","value":"Add an ability to edit attachment in the comments on new FSI"},{"name":"description","value":"
Currently, there is no option to edit the image in the comment section.



Plese note that after I clicked "add comment" this "edit" button appeared.

{"id":"JT-47151","entityId":"25-1983333","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"JT"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"47151"},{"name":"summary","value":"Can't properly add an image to a comment via keyboard (Cmd/Ctrl+V)"},{"name":"description","value":"
1. Edit comment
2. Want to insert (cmd+c) an image in the comment text.
3. The image is uploading, it's said "uploaded" but it doesn't appear in the text.
4. Refresh the page, the image is attached but not in the text as it was supposed to.

!image.png!
"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"created","value":"1525957039671"},{"name":"updated","value":"1526324500021"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"maksimrv"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Maksim Ryzhikov"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"Natasha.Katson"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Natasha Katson"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"0"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"markdown","value":"false"},{"name":"links","value":[{"value":"YTB-866","type":"Subtask","role":"subtask of"}]},{"name":"State","value":["Open"],"valueId":["Open"],"color":{"bg":"#fed74a","fg":"#444"}},{"name":"Subsystem","value":["Single Issue View"],"valueId":["Single Issue View"],"color":null},{"name":"Component","value":["Frontend"],"valueId":["Frontend"],"color":null},{"name":"Type","value":["Bug"],"valueId":["Bug"],"color":null},{"name":"Priority","value":["Normal"],"valueId":["Normal"],"color":{"bg":"#e6f6cf","fg":"#4da400"}},{"name":"sprint","value":[{"value":"sprint 67","id":"YouTrack:sprint 67"}]},{"name":"attachments","value":[{"value":"weird_edit_issue.gif","id":"74-522978","url":"https://youtrack.jetbrains.com/_persistent/weird_edit_issue.gif?file=74-522978&c=true"}]}],"comment":[],"tag":[]}, {"id":"JT-47124","entityId":"25-1981527","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"JT"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"47124"},{"name":"summary","value":"Download problem after authorization token timeout"},{"name":"description","value":"

If you leave opened tab with ticket for longer time and you then want to download a file from the ticket, chrome says "download failed" but the file is downloaded with fixed context (example in the attachments). If you do refresh (F5) and download file it is downloaded properly.

It looks the download link doesn't refresh oauth2 token automatically and you need to do it manually with F5.

"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"created","value":"1525786908517"},{"name":"updated","value":"1526297964636"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"Anna.Zhdan"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Anna Zhdan"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"l0coful"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Łukasz Frankowski"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"4"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"markdown","value":"true"},{"name":"State","value":["Open"],"valueId":["Open"],"color":{"bg":"#fed74a","fg":"#444"}},{"name":"Subsystem","value":["Authentication"],"valueId":["Authentication"],"color":null},{"name":"Component","value":["Frontend"],"valueId":["Frontend"],"color":null},{"name":"Type","value":["Bug"],"valueId":["Bug"],"color":null},{"name":"Priority","value":["Normal"],"valueId":["Normal"],"color":{"bg":"#e6f6cf","fg":"#4da400"}},{"name":"Affected versions","value":["2018.1"],"valueId":["2018.1"],"color":null},{"name":"sprint","value":[{"value":"sprint 67","id":"YouTrack:sprint 67"}]},{"name":"attachments","value":[{"value":"test.graphml","id":"74-522227","url":"https://youtrack.jetbrains.com/_persistent/test.graphml?file=74-522227&c=true"}]}],"comment":[{"id":"27-2861460","author":"jk","authorFullName":"Evgeny Naumenko","issueId":"JT-47124","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"
